doc.field: The Daily Worker and The Daily World Photographs Collection
The Daily Worker and The Daily World Photographs Collection

Contains indices of published images from the Daily Worker and the Daily World, mostly dating from the late 1960s. Each index card in the indices is annotated with the date and the page number where the image on the card was featured, as well as occasionally other annotations. Most of the indices are of individuals, though there is also a topical index on Vietnam. Researchers should note that this is only a partial index of the images included in the Daily Worker and Daily World photograph (PHOTOS 223) and negative (PHOTOS 223.001) collections.
The Daily Worker and The Daily World Photographs Collection
